message.content: {"id": "19651", "title": "Bug 19651 - Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view", "description": "The team menu was present in the step "9". The TestClass.java file, which is not in any CVS repository, was used to observe the problem. Initially, the issue was encountered with a file managed by CVS.", "OB": "Bug 19651 - The team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view. To reproduce the issue: 1) Close the two new windows. 2) Select the TestClass in the package view and open the popup menu. The team menu is no longer present.", "EB": "The team menu should be visible in the package view when TestClass is selected.", "SR": "Investigate the cause of the team menu disappearance and fix the issue so that the team menu remains visible in the package view, even when TestClass is selected."}
